name: FLASH-MD
description: An easy and simple WhatsApp bot developed by France King

PREFIX.description: insert a prefix for your bot, be it a letter, a number or a symbol

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Put on if you want the bot to autoread people's messages or else put off

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type on to activate this feature or type off to deactivate it ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_SAVE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(insert on to activate or no to deactivate ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type on to activate this feature or type off to deactivat it ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  separate them with a comma ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

BOT_MODE.description: type public to put your bot on public mode or private to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , make sure it starts with eyJub2I...

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

CHAT_BOT.desc: Type on to allow the bot to chat with people who text you or type off if you don't want the bot to chat with people

STARTING_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Put online to indicate that you are ever online even if you are not. Put typing to indicate that you are currently typing a message. Put recording to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.
